isis.stitle: INTERNATIONAL® VT 365 DIESEL ENGINE - CYLINDER HEAD AND VALVE TRAIN - Component Removal - Fuel Injectors

note.para: There is no need to drain the fuel rail if removing an injector in chassis.

figure.caption: Figure 116. Releasing the injector harness connector

step1.para: Use a correct sized socket to push the injector connector into the rocker arm carrier.

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, do not use air tools when removing and installing fuel injectors. The snap ring that extracts the injector can dislodge and fall into the oil drain hole.

figure.caption: Figure 117. Oil drain hole to glow plug
Figure 118. Positioning shop towels into oil drain holes with a screwdriver

note.para: The shop cloth towels can be positioned without the removal of glow plugs and buss bar.
Repeat this procedure for each injector assembly.

step1.para: Before removing the injector assembly, insert clean shop towels into oil drain holes next to each glow plug . A thin screwdriver at least six inches in length can be used to position shop towels into the oil drain holes . This step will enable the recovery of snap rings or other pieces dislodged during injector removal.

figure.caption: Figure 119. Fuel injector hold down clamp assembly (typical)

calloutgroup.callout1: Snap ring (earlier design) or Retainer (later design)

figure.caption: Figure 120. Fuel injector hold down clamp assembly

calloutgroup.callout1: Fuel injector hold down clamp assembly

step1.para: Use the Fuel Injector Hold Down Wrench to remove the fuel injector hold down clamp assembly.

caution.para: To prevent damage to the engine, make sure snap rings or pieces of snaps rings are found and removed.

calloutgroup.callout1: Fuel injector hold down clamp assembly

note.para: Loosening the injector bolt extracts the injector and clamp simultaneously.

step1.para: Once the injector assembly has been removed, verify snap ring is in place on each injector hold down bolt .

note.para: If a snap ring or piece of snap ring is missing from the injector hold down assembly, it must be located before removing any shop towels.

step1.para: Remove fuel injector from cylinder head bore by lifting injector and hold down clamp assembly straight up and out.
Place each fuel injector into the Injector Holder Rack .
